# Milestonelist

**Project:** ADPA - Advanced Document Processing & Automation Framework  
**Version:** 3.2.4  
**Repository:** [requirements-gathering-agent](https://github.com/mdresch/requirements-gathering-agent)  

---

## Overview

This Milestonelist outlines the major completed, ongoing, and planned milestones for the ADPA (Advanced Document Processing & Automation) Framework. The project delivers an enterprise-grade, AI-powered document automation platform, with comprehensive compliance to BABOK v3, PMBOK 7th Edition, and DMBOK 2.0 standards. It is designed for extensibility, security, and seamless integration with enterprise ecosystems.

---

## 1. Foundation & Core Architecture

### 1.1 Initial Framework and CLI/API Foundation
- **Completed:**  
  - Project scaffolding using Node.js 18+, TypeScript 5.7+, and Express.js.
  - Core CLI (`adpa`) and REST API implementation with Yargs and TypeSpec (OpenAPI 3.0).
  - Modular architecture supporting plug-and-play document generators and integrations.
  - Strict TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and Jest setup.

### 1.2 Multi-Provider AI Integration
- **Completed/Ongoing:**  
  - Integrated OpenAI, Google AI, GitHub Copilot, and Ollama support.
  - Intelligent AI provider failover and context management.
  - Environment-based provider configuration with secure credential handling.

---

## 2. Standards-Based Document Automation

### 2.1 BABOK v3 Automation
- **Completed:**  
  - Automated generation for all core BABOK v3 knowledge areas:
    - Requirements Elicitation & Analysis
    - Stakeholder Analysis & Management
    - Business Analysis Planning
    - Requirements Life Cycle Management
    - Strategy Analysis
    - Solution Evaluation
    - Underlying Competencies
    - Perspectives (Agile, BI, IT, BPM, etc.)
    - Enterprise Analysis
    - Introduction/overview document generator

### 2.2 PMBOK 7th Edition Support
- **Completed:**  
  - Project Charter & Scope Management automation
  - Stakeholder Management Plans
  - Risk & Quality Management documentation
  - Resource & Schedule Management
  - Cost Management & Control

### 2.3 DMBOK 2.0 Data Management
- **Completed:**  
  - Data Governance Frameworks
  - Data Stewardship & Roles
  - Data Modeling Standards
  - Data Quality Management Plans
  - Data Architecture & Modeling Guides
  - BI & Analytics Strategy, MDM, Metadata Management, Data Security & Privacy, Reference Data, Storage & Operations, Lifecycle Management

---

## 3. Advanced Planning & Analytics

### 3.1 Project Planning Artifacts Expansion
- **Completed:**  
  - Enhanced Work Breakdown Structure (WBS), WBS Dictionary, and Schedule Network Diagram processors ([see summary](PLANNING-ARTIFACTS-IMPLEMENTATION-SUMMARY.MD))
  - Hierarchical decomposition, effort estimation, critical path analysis, and deliverable traceability
- **Ongoing:**  
  - Progressive elaboration and integration with cost/schedule analytics

### 3.2 Adaptive Scope Control & Compliance Analytics
- **Ongoing:**  
  - Adaptive Scope Control Mechanism (real-time scope monitoring, PMBOK compliance, predictive analytics) ([see details](docs/ADAPTIVE-SCOPE-CONTROL.md))
  - AI-powered scope creep detection and automated approval workflows

### 3.3 Advanced Analytics Dashboard
- **Planned (Q2 2025):**  
  - Real-time usage metrics, document quality scoring, and compliance dashboards
  - Integration with BI tools and custom analytics widgets

---

## 4. Enterprise Integration & Scalability

### 4.1 REST API & OpenAPI/TypeSpec
- **Completed:**  
  - Express.js API with auto-generated OpenAPI documentation (TypeSpec)
  - API endpoints for document generation, template management, framework listing, and enterprise publishing

### 4.2 Admin Web Portal
- **Completed:**  
  - Next.js 14-based admin interface with document/request management, user administration, and configuration panels

### 4.3 Integration Connectors
- **Completed:**  
  - Confluence and SharePoint direct publishing
  - Adobe Document Services for PDF generation
  - VCS integration (GitHub, GitLab, Azure DevOps)
- **Planned:**  
  - Jira, ServiceNow, and additional enterprise connectors

### 4.4 Docker & Kubernetes Support
- **Planned (Q2 2025):**  
  - Docker containerization for all core services
  - Kubernetes deployment templates and best-practice manifests

### 4.5 Enterprise SSO & IAM
- **Planned (Q3 2025):**  
  - SAML, OAuth2, and Active Directory support for authentication/authorization

---

## 5. AI & Prompt Engineering Enhancements

### 5.1 Document-Type-Specific Prompt System
- **Completed:**  
  - Tailored AI prompting with role-based personas (CBAP, PMP, etc.) ([see PROMPT-ENGINEERING-GUIDE.MD](docs/PROMPT-ENGINEERING-GUIDE.md))

### 5.2 Few-Shot Learning Database
- **Completed:**  
  - Example-driven learning system for higher-quality, standards-compliant outputs ([see FEW-SHOT-LEARNING-GUIDE.MD](docs/FEW-SHOT-LEARNING-GUIDE.md))

### 5.3 Continuous Prompt Optimization
- **Ongoing:**  
  - Analytics-driven prompt evaluation and tuning

---

## 6. Quality, Testing & DevOps

### 6.1 Automated Testing & Coverage
- **Completed:**  
  - Jest-based unit, integration, and provider-specific tests (`test:azure`, `test:github`, `test:ollama`, etc.)
  - Performance and failover test suites

### 6.2 CI/CD Integration
- **Completed:**  
  - GitHub Actions: automated build, test, and deployment pipelines
  - Pre-release and release publishing for npm and Docker (when available)

---

## 7. Documentation, Community, and Support

### 7.1 Comprehensive Documentation Suite
- **Completed:**  
  - Full user and developer documentation (GitHub Wiki, CLI guides)
  - API docs, usage examples, and integration recipes
  - Contributor guides and code standards

### 7.2 Community & Enterprise Support Structures
- **Completed:**  
  - GitHub Issues/Discussions for feedback and support
  - Dedicated contact channel for enterprise clients

---

---

## 9. Unique Value & Differentiators

- **Unparalleled Standards Coverage:** Full automation for BABOK, PMBOK, and DMBOK artifacts.
- **Multi-AI-Provider Orchestration:** Seamless fallback and smart context management for reliable AI output.
- **Enterprise-Grade Integration:** Direct connectors for Confluence, SharePoint, Adobe, and VCS.
- **Modern DevOps:** TypeSpec-driven API, CI/CD pipelines, and strict coding/testing standards.
- **Adaptive Automation:** Intelligent scope control, analytics, and few-shot learning for superior document quality.

---

## 10. Milestone Management Guidance

- **Milestone tracking:** Use GitHub Projects/Issues for up-to-date milestone and task tracking.
- **Release planning:** Align feature sprints with the roadmap above; update this document for each major/minor release.
- **Collaboration:** Leverage GitHub Discussions for community-driven prioritization and feedback.

For the latest progress and detailed changelogs, see the [GitHub Releases page](https://github.com/mdresch/requirements-gathering-agent/releases) and the [Documentation Wiki](https://github.com/mdresch/requirements-gathering-agent/wiki).
